```{r, results = 'asis'}
cat("<h4><center> - ODMAP protocol - </center></h4>", sep = "")
cat("<h2><center>", input$study_title, "</center></h2>", sep = "")
cat("<p><b>Authors:</b> ", paste(authors$text, collapse = ", "), "</p>", sep = "")
cat("<p><b>DOI:</b> ", input$DOI, "</p>", sep = "")
cat("<p><b>Date:</b> ", as.character(Sys.Date()), "</p>", sep = "")
cat("\n", "______________", "\n", sep = "")

section = ""
subsection = ""
for(i in 1:nrow(elem_input)){
  # Find out if new section header needs to be rendered
  section_new = elem_input$section_id[i]
  if(section_new != section & !(section_new %in% elem_hide[[input$o_objective_1]])){
    section = section_new
    knit_section(section)
  }
  
  # Find out if new subsection header needs to be rendered
  subsection_new = elem_input$subsection_id[i]
  if(subsection_new != subsection & !(subsection_new %in% elem_hide[[input$o_objective_1]])){
    subsection = subsection_new
    knit_subsection(subsection)
  }
  
  # Render paragraphs
  paragraph_id = elem_input$paragraph_id[i]
  if(paragraph_id %in% names(input)){
    if(input[[paragraph_id]] == ""){
      knit_element_empty(paragraph_id)
    } else {
      knit_element_text(paragraph_id)
    }
  }
  
}
```
